titleStmt.title: The ansvver of the Commons, to a petition, in the name of thousands wel-affected persons inhabiting the city of London, Westminster, borough of Southwarke, and hamlets, and places adjacent.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "8ber [i.e. October] ye 23th".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
